title: paahimaam harE
sahitya:
pAhi mAm harE mahAnubhAva rAghava



caraNam 1



 pAhi rAma anucu rEyu bAgalu goliciti pAhi rAma nIvanucu sampadamu velaciti

   

caraNam 2



 pAhi rAma anucu pAri pAri kOriti pAhi rAma nAma mukta phalamu lEriti

   

caraNam 3



 pAhi rAma anucu bhuvini bAga buTTiti pAhi rAma anucu gaTTi paTTU baTTiti

   

caraNam 4



 pAhi rAma anucu nIdu padamu nammiti pAhi rAma anucu manasu bAguga rammiti

   

caraNam 5



 pAhi rAma anucu nIdu padamu bADiti pAhi rAma anucu parama padamu vEDiti

   

caraNam 6



 pAhi rAma anucu dhyAna paruDa naitini pAhi tyAgarAja vinuta bhaktuDaitini
